user_stories.title: Add RLM context self-read verification test
acceptance_criteria: New test case added to src/agent/__tests__/rlm-real.test.ts after line 65
Test stores prompt in CONTEXT_DATA instructing agent to output 'I SEE YOU'
Test configures RLM with only RunJS tool (allowedTools: ['RunJS'])
Test uses claude-3-haiku-20240307 model for fast execution
Test uses zai provider with fallback to anthropic
Test verifies result.output contains 'I SEE YOU' message
Test skips if API key not available
Test logs success message with console.log
Test passes when run with bun test src/agent/__tests__/rlm-real.test.ts
user_stories.notes: This is a single-story item. The test follows the existing pattern from rlm-real.test.ts:24-65 but verifies output instead of file side effects. The test proves that the RLM architecture can read its own context data through the RunJS tool.
